title: Getting Started
text: current version roadtrafficdeaths can installed GitHub : Next, libraries used vignette loaded. package loads data.frame object called rtdeaths.

title: Getting Started
text: example, use rtdeaths dataset extract annual quantity road traffic deaths Brazil, 1996 2022.

what: Road Traffic Deaths Data from Brazil
title: Road Traffic Deaths Data from Brazil
text: goal roadtrafficdeaths provide dataset death certificates road traffic crashes happened Brazil, Brazilian Ministry Health. dataset provided data.frame format. check variable, use ?rtdeaths.

title: Road Traffic Deaths Data from Brazil
text: can install current version roadtrafficdeaths GitHub :

title: Road Traffic Deaths Data from Brazil
text: basic example shows use package:
code: library(roadtrafficdeaths)  str(rtdeaths) #> 'data.frame':    1005743 obs. of  23 variables: #>  $ cid                : chr  "V789" "V099" "V234" "V284" ... #>  $ cod_modal_vitima   : chr  "V7" "V0" "V2" "V2" ... #>  $ modal_vitima       : chr  "Ônibus" "Pedestre" "Motocicleta" "Motocicleta" ... #>  $ cod_modal_outro    : chr  "8" "9" "3" "8" ... #>  $ modal_outro        : chr  "Sem colisão" "Não especificado" "Automóvel" "Sem colisão" ... #>  $ data_ocorrencia    : Date, format: "1999-02-22" "1999-03-28" ... #>  $ ano_ocorrencia     : num  1999 1999 1999 2014 2018 ... #>  $ idade_vitima       : num  33 58 28 25 24 30 20 23 49 24 ... #>  $ faixa_etaria_vitima: Factor w/ 17 levels "0 a 4 anos","5 a 9 anos",..: 7 12 6 6 5 7 5 5 10 5 ... #>  $ sexo_vitima        : chr  "Masculino" "Feminino" "Masculino" "Masculino" ... #>  $ escolaridade_vitima: chr  NA NA NA "de 1 a 3 anos" ... #>  $ raca_vitima        : chr  "Parda" "Preta" "Parda" "Parda" ... #>  $ ocup_cbo_vitima    : chr  "00034" "00612" "00004" "622020" ... #>  $ estado_civil_vitima: chr  NA NA NA "solteiro" ... #>  $ local_ocor         : chr  "saude" "hospital" "saude" "via" ... #>  $ cod_municipio_ocor : chr  "270630" "270030" "270750" "280240" ... #>  $ nome_regiao_ocor   : chr  "Nordeste" "Nordeste" "Nordeste" "Nordeste" ... #>  $ cod_municipio_res  : chr  "270760" "270260" "270030" "280240" ... #>  $ nome_regiao_res    : chr  "Nordeste" "Nordeste" "Nordeste" "Nordeste" ... #>  $ nome_uf_ocor       : chr  "Alagoas" "Alagoas" "Alagoas" "Sergipe" ... #>  $ nome_municipio_ocor: chr  "Palmeira dos Índios" "Arapiraca" "Porto Real do Colégio" "Gararu" ... #>  $ nome_uf_res        : chr  "Alagoas" "Alagoas" "Alagoas" "Sergipe" ... #>  $ nome_municipio_res : chr  "Quebrangulo" "Feira Grande" "Arapiraca" "Gararu" ...

title: Road Traffic Deaths Data from Brazil
text: use package, please cite follow:
code: citation("roadtrafficdeaths") #> To cite package 'roadtrafficdeaths' in publications use: #>  #>   Santos PAB, Saraiva JPM (2023). _roadtrafficdeaths: Road Traffic #>   Deaths Data from Brazil_. R package version 0.6.0, #>   https://github.com/pabsantos/roadtrafficdeaths, #>   <https://pabsantos.github.io/roadtrafficdeaths/>. #>  #> A BibTeX entry for LaTeX users is #>  #>   @Manual{, #>     title = {roadtrafficdeaths: Road Traffic Deaths Data from Brazil}, #>     author = {Pedro Augusto Borges Santos and João Pedro Melani Saraiva}, #>     year = {2023}, #>     note = {R package version 0.6.0, https://github.com/pabsantos/roadtrafficdeaths}, #>     url = {https://pabsantos.github.io/roadtrafficdeaths/}, #>   }

what: Brazilian road traffic deaths data — rtdeaths
title: Brazilian road traffic deaths data — rtdeaths
text: Death certificates road traffic crashes. Data Brazilian Ministry Health, 1996 2023. variables encoded Brazilian Portuguese.

title: Brazilian road traffic deaths data — rtdeaths
Brazilian road traffic deaths data — rtdeaths
text: data.frame 1,005,743 rows 23 columns: cid ICD-10 code main cause death cod_modal_vitima Code identifies type transport modal_vitima Mode transport victim road crash cod_modal_outro Code identifies third-party envolvement crash modal_outro Identifies third-party envolvement road crash data_ocorrencia Date death ISO 8601 format ano_ocorrencia Year death idade_vitima Age years victim faixa_etaria_vitima Age range victim sexo_vitima Sex victim escolaridade_vitima Education victim raca_vitima Race victim ocup_cbo_vitima Ocupation victim, based CBO code estado_civil_vitima Marital status victim local_ocor Place death victim cod_municipio_ocor City death occurrence, based IBGE code nome_regiao_ocor Brazilian region death occurred cod_municipio_res City residence victim, based IBGE code nome_regiao_res Brazilian region victim residence address nome_uf_ocor Name state death occurred nome_municipio_ocor Name city death occurred nome_uf_res Name state victim residence address nome_municipio_res Name city victim residence address

title: Brazilian road traffic deaths data — rtdeaths
text: ftp://ftp.datasus.gov.br/dissemin/publicos/SIM/CID10/DOFET
